attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Inheritance Tax Allowance level is far to low. In the last ten years since Labour came to power average house prices have increased approx over 300%, where as Inheritance Tax allowance level before you pay a whopping 40% Tax has only increase by aprrox 25%. Therefore to correct the balance and make it a fair tax again the allowance level needs to be doubled to 600 thousand.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
